x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_fix_scripts.description: Existing response templates are associated with all active response template channels during upgrade. Note, new templates are not associated with any channel be default. The user must specify which channels they want after template creation.
x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_fix_scripts.name: Link active response channels
